Range.Name: Content
Range.QueryData: select news.Name as TenVuViec , FORMAT(negaNews.IncurredDTG , 'HH:mm - dd/MM/yyyy') as NgayTiepNhanThongTin , negaNews.Place as DiaDiemHinhThuc , pa.Name as CoQuanBaoChi , pa.Name as CoQuanBaoChi1 , negaNews.Result as KetQuaXuLy , negaNews.ReporterInformation as ThongTinPhongVien , pa.Rate as DanhGiaCoQuanBaoChi , negaNews.Question as TomTatNoiDungHoi , negaNews.QuestionDetail as CauHoiChiTiet , negaNews.Resolution as HinhThucPhuongAnGiaiQuyet , negaNews.ResolutionContent as NoiDungPhuongAnGiaiQuyet , emp.Name as NguoiTrinh from NegativeNews negaNews left join News news on news.NewsID = negaNews.NewsID and news.Deleted = 0 left join adm_Employee emp on emp.EmployeeID = @EmployeeID and emp.Deleted = 0 left join agency_PressAgency pa on pa.PressAgencyID = negaNews.PressAgencyID and pa.Deleted = 0 where negaNews.NegativeNewsID = @NegativeNewsID and negaNews.Deleted = 0

Table.Name: QuaTrinhTimHieuThongTin
Table.QueryData: select FORMAT(negaNewsR.CreatedDTG, 'dd/MM/yyyy') as ThoiGian , negaNewsR.TypeOfContact as HinhThucTraoDoi , negaNewsR.ObjectContact as DVCNTraoDoi , negaNewsR.Content as NoiDungTraoDoi , negaNewsR.Result as NoiDungThongNhat from NegativeNewsResearched negaNewsR where negaNewsR.NegativeNewsID = @NegativeNewsID and negaNewsR.Deleted = 0
